title: Monthly exchange rate of USD to GBP 2017 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and USD GBP exchange rate in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum USD GBP exchange rate 0.82 is found at Month Aug 19 and the minimum is found at Mar 18 where Month is 0.71.
The highest Month Aug 19 has 0.11 more USD GBP exchange rate than the lowest Month Mar 18.
min_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and USD GBP exchange rate in each Month on the y axis.
Month Aug 19 has the highest USD GBP exchange rate and Mar 18 has the lowest USD GBP exchange rate.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows USD GBP exchange rate for 25 number of Months.
The maximum USD GBP exchange rate 0.82 is found at Month Aug 19 and the minimum is found at Mar 18 where Month is 0.71.
The second highest USD GBP exchange rate is appeared to be the Month Jul 19.
The highest Month Aug 19 has 0.11 more USD GBP exchange rate than the lowest Month Mar 18.
The Month Aug 19 has the highest USD GBP exchange rate, followed by Jul 19, and Oct 18. Down to the Month Mar 18 which is the lowest.
The USD GBP exchange rate has lowered over the past 25 Months.
Month Jan 19, Sep 18, Jul 18, Jun 18, and Oct 17 share the same value 0.76.
The Month Aug 19 has 1.07 times more USD GBP exchange rate than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 19.07.
